summary: Defines a PyVista theme tailored for PyMAPDL visualizations, establishing default colormap, font family, and plot title, while exposing properties for customizing background, axes, scalar bar, and other visual aspects.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use, customizable visual style for MAPDL plots so users can consistently present simulation results with appropriate colors, fonts, and titles, enhancing clarity and professionalism.
